website_summaries.verdict: A straightforward pop-up tent that's easy to carry and set up, and not too difficult to take down. Has quality and features that campers love plus a price that's hard to resist.
pros: Can be set up in seconds
cons: Not as spacious as other models on our list, but for the price and quality you may not mind
Some issues with putting it back in its bag

customer_reviews.title: loved it!
customer_reviews.text: my only issue was that I was sent the wrong color, but no complaints because my newborn loved it and thoroughly enjoyed his first beach day while being protected from the sun. more than enough room for him to nap, and me to lay inside and nurse him, with a small cooler and my purse inside, and my sister joining us as well (it was a bit cramped when she sat under with us, but we all still fit!!!) I was definitely surprised it was so spacious. Easy set up, closing it was a bit tricky (even with the instructions) but if you're patient and gentle it makes sense after a few tries.
customer_reviews.author: Anasia

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY. We've had this tent for 7 weeks, used it a grand total of 3 times. It is completely broken - sides warped and stakes bent out of shape. Really disappointed since summer isn't yet over and it broke on a non-windy day. Twist tents tend to break after a season, but from use 3 Times is a bit absurd. How do we get a refund or replacement?
customer_reviews.author: M Ray

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great tent. It popped open right away. My 4 years old son right away used it as his private iPad place LOL. Update: 8/15/17 The tent didn't work for us on the beach. It was a bit windy and the pegs kept coming off the wet sand and the tent was moving around. Also it takes a long time and effort to fold it back.
customer_reviews.author: Mommyof2

customer_reviews.title: Great little beach tent
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice, light-weight pop up beach tent. It is very easy to carry from the beach house to the beach with the zippered bag and shoulder strap. It can be a small challenge to stuff it all back into the bag, but once you do it, no issue the next time!
customer_reviews.author: Brenda C. Brocato

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: Working out well. Opens easily and folds nicely. Very happy with this for beach trips with baby
customer_reviews.author: Amy Davies

customer_reviews.title: ... about folding it back up but this was the best summer investment yet
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this product as I read mixed reviews about folding it back up but this was the best summer investment yet. It is roomy enough for two kids to sit inside to get out of the shade and it was so small and portable. Taking it out and putting it back was no problem. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Alice Wee

customer_reviews.title: Super fun and playful tent!
customer_reviews.text: This tent was easy to set up and is perfect for a children's play tent! The colors are fun and it would be great as a backyard sun shelter for kids to play in during the day! The ventilation in the back is a great way to let air in and its nice that the front zipped close also! Customer Service was amazing to work with when I had a few questions for them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This tent is great- as long as you never want to put it back in the bag. Needless to say- were returning it. Ours also seemed warped when we first popped it open. Save you're money.
customer_reviews.author: 68SS

customer_reviews.title: Very useful!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at the beach. Big enough for 2 people! and baby!!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: smaller than pictured but great buy
customer_reviews.text: Very Cute and helpful tent. The picture on amazon makes it look much bigger than it really is. I would say its perfect for 2-3 toddlers or 2 children. We used it as a play area and nap tent while camping. My son loves it :)
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: Great when it's open
customer_reviews.text: Great when it's open. Good luck folding it back into the pouch while juggling a baby and other beach items We threw it out
customer_reviews.author: Ro

customer_reviews.title: Ugh..
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't fold this back into the tiny bag.. for the life of me. Would not buy it again.😆
customer_reviews.author: lisa berger

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shade tent. Easy pop up design.
customer_reviews.text: Great pop up tent for the beach. Super easy to open & close- fits right back in the carrying case.
customer_reviews.author: Nee

customer_reviews.title: Great tent! Bought it for an upcoming beach trip
customer_reviews.text: Great tent! Bought it for an upcoming beach trip. My daughter loved it...she immediately grabbed her beach toys and starting playing inside!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan P Kohne

customer_reviews.title: This tent was able to be successfully folded one time ...
customer_reviews.text: This tent was able to be successfully folded one time. After that, something in the internal wires became twisted and it could no longer be put back into its storage bag. We would have returned it, but missed the window. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great tent; however
customer_reviews.text: Great tent; however, not impressed with how you twist and turn the tent when trying to fit back in the small bag. The directions were not helpful and I could not fit it back into the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke M Royer

customer_reviews.title: Love this tent
customer_reviews.text: Love this tent! It held up at the beach with very high wind speeds. I had to youtube a video on how to close it the very first time because the instructions aren't very helpful, would be nice if a video was included on here!
customer_reviews.author: BRWand

customer_reviews.title: This tent was fantastic and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This tent was fantastic and easy to use. The only thing I did not like about it was that the front did not seal all the way to keep bugs out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. I use it in my classroom as a quiet area for students who need a moment to deescalate their emotions or to read their books. Fits 2-3 elementary school children.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: wonderful tent, my family loves it but a pain to put it back and it lasts one season.
customer_reviews.author: Subhashish Acharya

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was great for the kids on the beach! Very easy to put up and take down!
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Cochrane

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Such a pain to set up and put back in the bag
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this Beach Tent
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this Beach Tent. It comes with the standard cheap tent stakes so u may want to buy nicer ones bc they break or get lost in the sand. Nice and bright easy to spot when trying to find your way back to it.
customer_reviews.author: Will Zuke

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Worked as expected. Easy to fold after watching a youtube video.
customer_reviews.author: Ive

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to close
customer_reviews.text: After attempting to close this for over an hour while watching YouTube videos, this is what the tent looked like. We can't even return it!
customer_reviews.author: Gina Farrelly

customer_reviews.title: It's a winner!
customer_reviews.text: it's just the right size and is so easy to transport! It's a winner!
customer_reviews.author: Kac

product_meta.title: MONOJOY Outdoor Automatic Pop Up Beach Tent, Portable Cabin Camping Tent Sun Shelter for 1-2 Person (Green)
